description: Total Excel Converter is the right choice to convert XLS, XLSX, ODS, XML to PDF, Open Office, Image, Word, Text, XML, DBF, Access or CSV files. Excel Converter has the widest list of supported formats (including OpenOffice ODT and ODS; XML, SQL, Lotus, DB). It works via clear user interface or can be used via the command line. Processing thousands of files it keeps your folder structure in the perfect order.
summary: Convert XLS, XLSX, ODS, XML to Doc, PDF, SVG, HTML, ODS, Image, JPG, TIFF, XML, DBF, SQL, Access, CSV.
author: CoolUtils
